G

Game - Class in fr.uge.patchwork
Class representing the Game object. class grouping all the parameters needed to start a game.
Game(int) - Constructor for class fr.uge.patchwork.Game
Constuctor who initialize the Game Object. combines an available patch list, a button bank (Money object), a general game board for both players, a game mode and a variable to representer the neutral pawn.
getArrayGeneral() - Method in class fr.uge.patchwork.Game
Accessor method to call the main game board.
getArraypatch() - Method in class fr.uge.patchwork.Player
gettors who return the patch list (arrayPatch)
getArrayPatch() - Method in class fr.uge.patchwork.Game
Accessor method to call the patch board.
getArrayPlayer() - Method in class fr.uge.patchwork.Player
Accessor who return the patch board (arrayPlayer)
getBank() - Method in class fr.uge.patchwork.Money
Accessor method who return the amount in the bank.

Accessor method who returns the value distance.
getMode() - Method in class fr.uge.patchwork.Game
Accessor method that returns the selected game mode.
